name: tag-summary-plugin
description: This plugin creates summaries with paragraphs or blocks of text that share the same tag(s).

scripts.copy-assets: cpx manifest.json build && cpx styles.css build
scripts.build: npm run copy-assets && tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
